com.sails.map.overlay

Class Marker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sails.map.overlay.Marker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OverlayItem

    public class Marker
extends java.lang.Object
implements OverlayItem
    A Marker draws a android.graphics.drawable.Drawable at a given geographical position.

      • boundCenter

        public static Drawable boundCenter(Drawable drawable)
        Sets the bounds of the given drawable so that (0,0) is the center of its bounding box.
        Parameters:
        drawable - the drawable whose bounds should be set.
        Returns:
        the given drawable with set bounds.

      • boundCenterBottom

        public static Drawable boundCenterBottom(Drawable drawable)
        Sets the bounds of the given drawable so that (0,0) is the center of its bottom row.
        Parameters:
        drawable - the drawable whose bounds should be set.
        Returns:
        the given drawable with set bounds.

      • draw

        public boolean draw(BoundingBox boundingBox,
           byte zoomLevel,
           Canvas canvas,
           Point canvasPosition,
           int centerX,
           int centerY,
           float rotationAngle)
        Description copied from interface: OverlayItem
        Draws this OverlayItem on the given canvas.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface OverlayItem
        Parameters:
        boundingBox - the geographical area which should be drawn.
        zoomLevel - the zoom level at which this OverlayItem should draw itself.
        canvas - the canvas on which this OverlayItem should draw itself.
        canvasPosition - the top-left pixel position of the canvas on the world map at the given zoom level.
        Returns:
        true if this OverlayItem is visible and has drawn itself, false otherwise.
